name: BubbleTrouble
description:
BubbleTrouble is a 100% JavaScript game

  • The objective is to remove all bubbles. To goto next level.
  • Once 4 or more same bubbles are connected. They'll disappear!
  • Works best in Firefox.

How to play:

  • ( <- ) rotates shooter to left.
  •  ( -> ) rotates shooter to right.
  • ( ^ )  shoots
  • ( P ) pauses the game
  • ( esc ) can always return to home.
  • Can be played on mobile device
